attributes.action: Deploy British Military personnel to Calais to guard our border
attributes.background: Our Country is now at serious risk from illegal immigrants and, due to a lack of interest from the French authorities, the only positive step we can use is by using our Military.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105489

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
